member.name: T:ModLib.Helper.AttributeTargetHelper`1
member.summary: Helps in discovery of the target of an Attribute
member.remarks:
The .NET framework does not provide navigation from attributes back to their targets, principally for the reason that in typical usage scenarios for attributes, the attribute is discovered by a routine which already has a reference to a member type.
There are, however, bona-fide cases where an attribute needs to detect it's target - an example is a localizable sub-class of the DescriptionAttribute. In order for the DescriptionAttribute to return a localized string, it requires a resource key and, ideally, a type reference as the base-key for the ResourceManager. A DescriptionAttribute could not provide this information without a reference to it's target type.
Note to callers:
Your Attribute-derived class must implement Equals and GetHashCode, otherwise a run-time exception will occur, since this class creates a dictionary of attributes in order to speed up target lookups.

member.name: F:ModLib.Helper.AttributeTargetHelper`1.targetMap
member.summary: Map of attributes and their respective targets

member.summary: List of assemblies that should not be rescanned for types.

member.summary: Adds an attribute and it's target to the dictionary

member.summary: Scans an assembly for all instances of the attribute.

member.summary: Returns the target of an attribute.
member.param: The attribute for which a target is sought
member.returns: The target of the attribute - either an Assembly, Type or MemberInfo instance.

member.name: T:ModLib.Example
member.summary: 部分常用API接口，和简单的例子

member.name: M:ModLib.Example.TestTimer
member.summary: g.timer：延迟控制，游戏中大部分类都是不继承MonoBehaviour，且IL2CPP下不能动态载入Mono，在普通类想做延迟调用，或者每帧调用则可以利用g.timer

member.name: M:ModLib.Example.TestEvents
member.summary: g.events：事件，游戏中所有的广播都是通过这个广播的。 EGameType：游戏通用广播 EMapType：在大地图时的广播 EBattleType：在战斗场景时的广播

member.name: M:ModLib.Example.OnUnitHitDynIntHandler(ETypeData)
member.summary: 广播的参数只需要一个：ETypeData e

member.summary: 当你在战斗中的时候，可以通过SceneType.battle访问管理器入口
